knowledge_transfers: SSOT domain registry must be kept in sync between docs/SSOT_DOMAIN_MAPPING.md and validation tools
HTML comment format <!-- SSOT Domain: domain_name --> is the standard SSOT tag format
Validation tools should extract domains from SSOT_DOMAIN_MAPPING.md dynamically to avoid registry drift
Pattern matching for SSOT tags must support multiple formats: HTML comments, @domain, @ssot, SSOT domain:
A2A coordination enables parallel work: Agent-6 validation + Agent-8 registry updates = faster completion
lessons_learned: SSOT domain registry updates require coordination between documentation and validation tools
Pattern matching must support all SSOT tag formats used in codebase (HTML comments are standard)
Dynamic domain extraction from SSOT_DOMAIN_MAPPING.md prevents registry drift
A2A coordination enables parallel validation and registry updates for faster completion
Registry updates should be verified with re-validation to confirm all domains recognized
